frontmatter.title: Argo Workflows
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as design for Argo Workflows
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Collaboratively manage infrastructure with your coworkers synchronously sharing the same designs.
featureList: UI to visualize and manage Workflows.
Workflow templating to store commonly used Workflows in the cluster.
Archiving Workflows after executing for later access.
